title: Grateful for Christine's help in welcoming me to the open-source community
description: I just wanted to thank Christine for her tremendous help and support in my introduction to open-source software. She was a fantastic mentor and ensured I had everything I needed to get started and feel welcome in the community. Her patience and kindness meant a lot to me. Thank you for being such a fantastic support and making me feel like a valuable part of the open-source community. Your contributions are greatly appreciated!
